languages.text: "Клянусь свято блюсти законы Лекс Империалис, закона всего Человечества и волю Его".
"I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."
languages.original_text: "Клянусь свято блюсти законы Лекс Империалис, закона всего Человечества и волю Его".

traits.locale_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of Lex Imperialis, the law of all Humanity, and His will.".
"I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, the law of all Humanity, and His will.".
"I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, the law of all Humanity, and His will.".
"I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."
"I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

languages.text: "Ich schwöre, die Gesetze des Lex Imperia zu wahren, denn sie sind das Recht aller Menschen und Sein in Form gegossener Wille."
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre, die Gesetze des Lex Imperia zu wahren, denn sie sind das Recht aller Menschen und Sein in Form gegossener Wille."

languages.text: « Je jure de faire respecter les préceptes de la Lex Imperialis, car c'est la loi de toute l'humanité et la manifestation de la volonté de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: « Je jure de faire respecter les préceptes de la Lex Imperialis, car c'est la loi de toute l'humanité et la manifestation de la volonté de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: “我发誓维护帝国的律法，因为它是全人类的律法，是神皇意志的体现。”
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: “我发誓维护帝国的律法，因为它是全人类的律法，是神皇意志的体现。”

languages.text: «Juro defender las leyes de la Lex Imperialis, pues es la ley de la Humanidad y Su voluntad hecha texto».
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: «Juro defender las leyes de la Lex Imperialis, pues es la ley de la Humanidad y Su voluntad hecha texto».

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリア、それは全人類の法、そして皇帝の意志の具現なり。我はこの法を守り抜くことを、ここに誓おう」
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリア、それは全人類の法、そして皇帝の意志の具現なり。我はこの法を守り抜くことを、ここに誓おう」

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis kanunlarına sadakatle riayet edeceğime yemin ederim zira bu; bütün İnsanlığın yasasıdır, O'nun iradesinin cisim bulmuş hâlidir."
languages.original_text: "I swear to uphold the laws of the Lex Imperialis, for it is the law of all Humanity and His will given form."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis kanunlarına sadakatle riayet edeceğime yemin ederim zira bu, bütün İnsanlık'ın yasasıdır, O'nun iradesinin cisim bulmuş hâlidir."
